name: notes_generator
description: Generate concise, structured notes from uploaded files or direct text input, optionally focusing on a specific topic.

inputs.label: Content (Text or URL)
inputs.name: text_content
inputs.description: Enter raw text or a URL (YouTube, Website, or Google Sheets). If file is not provided, content must be provided here.

inputs.label: File Upload
inputs.name: doc_url
inputs.description: Upload a file (CSV, PDF, DOCX, PPT, TXT) by providing its URL. file must be provided, if text_content is not provided.

inputs.label: File/URL Type
inputs.name: doc_type
inputs.description: The type of file or URL being provided (e.g., PDF, YouTube, Website, etc.). Required if you upload a file or link.

inputs.label: Topic or Focus
inputs.name: focus_topic
inputs.description: The specific topic or focus area to tailor the generated notes.

inputs.label: Language
inputs.name: lang
inputs.description: Language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr') for multilingual note generation.

inputs.label: Page Layout
inputs.name: page_layout
inputs.description: Choose the layout format for your final notes.
